definitions.definition: A discrete organ in the center of a flower capable of receiving pollen and producing a fruit , it is divided into an ovary , style and stigma .
examples: Some plant species have more than one pistil per flower.

main_definition: ( botany ) A discrete organ in the center of a flower capable of receiving pollen and producing a fruit , it is divided into an ovary , style and stigma . [from 18th c.]
